mapper.select: SELECT a.seq ,a.memberID ,a.memberPW ,a.memberName ,a.memberPlace ,(select count(*) from itemCart aa join member bb on aa.member_seq = bb.seq where bb.memberID = #{memberID} ) as itemCartCount FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND memberID = #{memberID} AND memberPW = #{memberPW}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM itemCart a JOIN member b on a.member_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND b.seq = #{seq}
